Header: Director General Military Training Pakistan in Colombo Meets Commander of the Army
Content: Director General Military Training Pakistan, Major General Chiragh Haider, together with Colonel Arif Bangash, Major Jan Badshah who are now on tour in Sri Lanka paid a courtesy call on the Commander of the Army Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake at the Army Headquarters, Colombo this morning (13). During their meet with the Commander of the Army, matters of bilateral interest and possibilities of further expansion of training opportunities between two outfits were taken up for brief discussions. Towards the end of the friendly meeting, Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake presented a memento of goodwill and understanding to the visiting Senior Officer. Major General Aruna Wanniarachchi, Director General Training and Defence Advisor to the High Commission of Pakistan in Sri Lanka, Colonel Sajjad Ali were also associated with the delegation.
